subject: Suits and Litigation
Ponzi Schemes
lead_paragraph: The Wilpon family, which owns the Mets, invested with Bernard L. Madoff and might face legal action if a court-appointed trustee finds it profited from the Ponzi scheme.
snippet: The Wilpon family, which owns the Mets, invested with Bernard L. Madoff and might face legal action if a court-appointed trustee finds it profited from the Ponzi scheme.
